caption.p: Loading ( a) and score ( b) plots from principal components analysis of leaf rolling, leaf drying, and number of tillers during drought at vegetative stages. Treatments, including drought at the seedling stage, are encircled by a full line, while treatments, including drought at tillering, are encircled by a dotted line. D0: Well-watered during the whole growing season; DS: Drought treatment at the seedling stage; DST: Drought treatment at the seedling and tillering stage; DT: Drought treatment at the tillering stage; DTR: Drought treatment at the tillering and reproductive stages; DR: Drought treatment at reproductive stage; DSTR: Drought treatment at the seedling, tillering, and reproductive stages. Numbers refer to cultivars as follow; 1: ‘Ingwizabukungu’; 2: ‘Intsindagirabigega’; 3: ‘Jyambere’; 4: ‘Mpembuke’; 5: ‘Ndamirabahinzi’; 6: ‘Nemeyubutaka’; and 7: ‘Zong geng’.
